altTitles.ja: ストランド

description.en: Four high school classmates, not exactly close friends, share moments that are both fun and irreplaceable, yet tinged with a quiet heartache they don’t even realize. 'It feels like time has stopped.' Youth is both vibrant and muted. These are the daily lives of high schoolers—and the strange twists in between. A story that explores the meaning of a small act of courage in an unconventional coming-of-age drama (Anti-Electric Parade) begins!

title.en: Ore no tomodachi ♂♀ ga kawai sugite komaru!

altTitles.en: 俺の友達♂♀が可愛すぎて困る！
My Childhood Friend Is So Cute, It's Frustrating!
I Am Worried That My Childhood Friend Is Too Cute!

altTitles.vi: Người bạn thời thơ ấu của tôi quá dễ thương!

description.en: "If my guy friend turned into a girl, he would be the perfect girlfriend!" Returning to his hometown after 10 years, Amano Koichi is thrilled to finally reunite with his childhood friend, Yukio Sawatari on the first day of school when suddenly, he turns female! Yukio is affected by "Sudden sex change syndrome", a rare condition present in one every ten thousand people which randomly changes their gender!Koichi can't help but be flustered by his childhood friend's cuteness. How will this complicate their relationship? Will it develop into a forbidden romance?! Find out in this exciting TSF Rom-com!
description.id:
Amano, yang kembali ke kota tempat dia tinggal sewaktu kecil untuk pertama kalinya setelah 10 tahun, bertemu Yukio Sawatari, seorang teman masa kecil di hari pertama pemindahan, ketika dia (seorang teman pria) menjadi wanita! Meskipun dia berbagi suka citanya, saat dia tiba-tiba berubah menjadi seorang gadis dan tidak bisa menyembunyikan rasa malunya. Yukio terkena penyakit seperti 100.000 orang lainnya, tiba-tiba menjadi seorang gadis yang disebut "spontaneous isomerism metamorphosis"!  
  
Teman masa kecil perempuan ♂ yang imut dan dalam kesulitan!? Cinta TSF (transeksual) Terlarang!  
  
Kalo gak paham baca ajalah, ada sinopsis juga gak guna.
description.vi:
Khi trở về thành phố nơi từng sống sau 10 năm, Amano Koichi đã gặp lại người bạn tuổi thơ là Yukio Sawatari vào ngày đầu tiên ở trường mới thì bỗng nhiên Yukio lại đổi giới tính?! Anh bị ảnh hưởng bởi một căn bệnh chỉ có trong một trong mười nghìn người gọi là "hội chứng đổi giới đột ngột"! 

Từ đây bắt đầu câu truyện về tình yêu với người bạn tuổi thơ đổi giới.

altTitles.ja: 大ダーク

description.en:
A legend spreading among the whole universe says whoever collects Zaha Sanko's bones will have any kind of wish granted. 
Thus, he and his skeletal buddy Avakian will use their dark powers to fend off any murder attempts while they search through 
space for whoever put this curse on Sanko’s bones: killing them might end the madness.
description.ru: С самого детства Заха Санко боролся за свою жизнь. Как гласят легенды, если вы завладеете костями Захи Санко, вам исполнится любое желание. Вместе со своим другом Авакяном и силой тьмы Заха путешествует по космосу, чтобы найти человека, который проклял его кости и положил конец их жизни.

altTitles.th: นักเรียนพี่เลี้ยงเด็ก

altTitles.ja: 学園ベビーシッターズ

description.en: After their parents are killed in a plane crash, Ryuuichi and his younger brother Kotarou are taken in by the chairman, who they never met before, of an elite academy. Ryuuichi becomes the school daycare's new babysitter.
description.pt: Após perderem os pais em um acidente de avião os irmãos Kotarou e Ryuuichi são mandados para o colégio Morinomiya, lá eles precisam trabalhar na creche para poder manter sua estadia.
description.pt-br: Após perderem os pais em um acidente de avião os irmãos Kotarou e Ryuuichi são mandados para o colégio Morinomiya, lá eles precisam trabalhar na creche para poder manter sua estadia.

title.en: Hazure Hantei kara Hajimatta Cheat Majutsushi Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: ハズレ判定から始まったチート魔術士生活

altTitles.zh: 从废柴判定开始的魔术士人生

altTitles.en: Life as a Cheat Magician that began with a False Judgment

description.en:
One day, all the eighth grade students were transferred to another world.

The princess of the other world summoned them to make up for their lack of strength. The students are threatened and decide to follow the princess, and they are made to take a magical power test to determine their abilities. While everyone is sorted according to their results, Kokubun Kento's result is a flop.

Judged as useless, he is expelled. However, there is actually a tremendous ability lurking within Kento... 

The life-size eighth grader Kento, together with his fellow skeletons, aims to rescue his classmates!

---

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5782dy/) (jp)
description.ja:
ある日、中学２年生の生徒全員が異世界に転移させられた。

異世界の王女が、戦力不足を補うために彼らを召喚したのだ。脅されて王女に従うことにした生徒たちは、能力を調べる魔力判定を受けさせられる。みんなが結果に応じて振り分けられていくなか、国分健人の判定結果はハズレ。

使い物にならないと判断されて、追放されてしまった。だが、健人の内には実は物凄い能力が潜んでいて… 

等身大の中学２年生の健人が、仲間になったスケルトンとともに同級生たちの救出を目指す！

title.en: Tonari no Seki no Yatsu ga Souiu Me de Mitekuru

altTitles.ja: となりの席のヤツがそういう目で見てくる

altTitles.es-la: La persona sentada a mi lado me mira de esa manera
La persona de al lado me mira con esos ojos

altTitles.uk: Однокласниця що сидить біля мене, дивиться на мене хтивими очима

altTitles.en: The weirdo one desk over keeps giving me THAT kind of look

description.en: Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?
description.ja: 主人公の池沢くんは、同じクラスの美少女・江口さんのことを「そういう目」で見ている。しかし実は、江口さんも「そういう目」で池沢くんのことを見ていて！？チラ見えする筋肉、汗ばむ肌、髪の香り…互いに興味津々な2人の「下心」から始まる純愛ラブコメ！好きな人のなら、臭いも汗も×××も…全部好き。

altTitles.ja: クールな同級生の◯◯年後...

altTitles.en: The Cool Classmate XX Years Later...

altTitles.vi: Cô bạn cùng lớp lạnh lùng sau ◯◯ năm...

altTitles.ja: マッチ売り

description.en: University student Kiyotaka Hirose finds a love letter tucked into the pages of a borrowed book. The intended recipient is a mystery, but the writer’s identity is clear: a fellow student who’s suddenly leaving Tokyo and heading back to his hometown. Hirose is determined to return the letter, and as he tries to do so he runs into a black-market match seller, Seiji Hanashiro. Drawn to each other at first sight, tangled up in destiny and their own feelings, the men see their lives turned upside down by a single love letter. The first volume of Sakae Kusama’s standalone series, Lost Letters.

title.en: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai

altTitles.en: I Wanna Do Bad Things with You

altTitles.ja: 君と悪いことがしたい

description.en: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Soushi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
description.ja: 背は高いけど地味で暗い脇役女子・まもり。嫌いだからとプールの水を抜く、学校一の嫌われ者の悪役男子・藤。悪いヤツの、不思議な強さに惹かれていったその先にあったのは、透き通るような青い日々。

description.en:
Short comics posted by Holiday Yasumi on Twitter/X.

The chapter numbers aren't important as most of the comics are unrelated to the rest, though some feature recurring characters.

altTitles.ja: 魔法先生ネギま！

altTitles.th: คุณครูจอมเวท เนกิมะ!

description.en:
Ten-year-old prodigy Negi Springfield, has just graduated from magic academy, and in order to become a master mage he is sent to Japan to teach English at an all-girls middle school. But Negi has a bigger dream than just becoming a master mage. He wants to find his missing father, "The Thousand Master", the strongest mage that has ever lived. And he soon finds that searching for his father wont be as easy as he first hoped. In fact, it pushes him and his students into life-or-death battles that decides the fate of millions.

---

Alternate official English:
- [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/193)

altTitles.ja: スケットダンス

description.en:
The hilarious misadventures of the "Sket Dan"; a group of high-schoolers who help out people as part of their club activity. Himeko, the hot-headed ex-delinquent with a soft spot for cute things and a taste for strange food. Switch, the brainy otaku who only talks via a computerized speech-application. And Bossun, the atypical leader of this looney bunch, with the amazing power to… concentrate very hard!

- Won the 55th annual Shogakukan Manga Award in 2009 for best shounen manga.  


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **SKET DANCE** (2015)

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentashinohara_)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=12089)
description.ru:
"Скет Данс" - школьный клуб, чья деятельность весьма необычна - помогать в решении абсолютно любых проблем, которые возникли у учеников или даже учителей. А члены этого чудо-клуба, не менее странные личности, чем сам клуб: Боссун - гений дедуктивного мышления, Химэко - боевая единица группы и Свич - "мозг" и хакер мира сего. Вы всегда можете к ним обратиться, если осмелитесь…  
  
- Won the 55th annual Shogakukan Manga Award in 2009 for best shounen manga.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentashinohara_)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=12089)
description.vi:
Tình tiết xoay quanh 3 thanh niên rảnh rỗi của câu lạc bộ SKET (chuyên giải quyết mọi rắc rối cho người khác):
- 1 nam thanh niên ngáo ngơ, chỉ thông minh lúc full trang bị.
- 1 nữ thanh niên lực lưỡng, trâu chó nhất bản đồ.
- 1 nam thanh niên Otaku chỉ nói chuyện qua laptop.

Bao gồm những câu chuyện dở khóc dở cười mà cười có khi rớt hàm mà khóc thì có khi lụt nhà -  và còn chứa rất nhiều oxi drama hít hà bổ phổi (. ❛ ᴗ ❛.)

altTitles.ja: 終の退魔師―エンダーガイスター

altTitles.th: มือปราบปิศาจคนสุดท้าย ENDER GEISTER

altTitles.vi: Chung Chi Thối Ma Sư -Ender Geister-

description.en: Akira, a demonically strong S-class exorcist, is sent from Germany to investigate a paranormal event in a certain city in Japan. He destroys creatures from other worlds with his beautiful exorcist partner Chikage.
description.es: Akira es un exorcista de clase S que es enviado desde Alemania para investigar un incidente sobrenatural en cierta ciudad de Japón. Él y su compañera, la hermoso exorcista Chikage, acabarán a las criaturas que han venido de otro mundo.
description.id: Akira adalah pengusir setan kelas S yang dikirim dari Jerman untuk menyelidiki insiden supernatural di kota tertentu di Jepang. Dia dan rekannya, pengusir setan cantik Chikage, akan menghabisi makhluk yang datang dari dunia lain.
description.ja:
この主人公、破天荒にして最強の退魔師＜エクソシスト＞

日本のとある都市で起きた超常現象事件を調査しに、ドイツから派遣されたS級退魔師アキラ。相棒の美人退魔師チカゲと共に異世界よりやってきたクリーチャー共を撃ち！殴り！ぶったおしまくる！！
description.pt-br: Este protagonista, o mais demonicamente poderoso exorcista. Akira, o exorcista de classe S, foi enviado da Alemanha para investigar um evento paranormal em uma certa cidade do Japão. Ele atira em criaturas de outros mundos com sua bela parceira exorcista, Chikage.

altTitles.ja: 遊☆戯☆王 OCGストラクチャーズ
遊☆戯☆王 オフィシャルカードゲーム ストラクチャーズ
遊戯王 OCGストラクチャーズ
遊戯王 オフィシャルカードゲーム ストラクチャーズ

altTitles.pt-br: O Rei dos Jogos! Estruturas OCG

description.en:
Shoma Yusa, a new kid who moved to Tokyo with his sister, learns how to make friends through Dueling and creating Structure Decks.  
  
*This series is based on the real life Yu-Gi-Oh! OCG (Official Card Game, known in the west as TCG) and how to build the best deck, based on the latest rule- and banlist.*
description.pt-br:
Shoma Yusa, um novo garoto que se mudou para Tóquio com sua irmã, aprende a fazer amigos através de Duelos e criando Decks Estruturais. 

*Esta série é baseada no jogo da vida real de Yu-Gi-Oh! OCG (Official Card Game, conhecido no ocidente como TCG) e como construir o melhor deck, com base nas últimas regras e banlists.*

description.en:
Futura, the land of Techs. This is the story of a boy named Tek who can't use Techs. But he will persist through many harsh battles to make Futura a better place to live!

(Note: It gets good 200 chapters in.)

♥ Support: patreon.com/teknomanga
♥ Animated Trailer: youtube.com/watch?v=Q7Z2A0Ba03A
♥ Discord: discord.gg/pVZts8fdTf

title.en: I Need Someone to Stop My Older Brothers

altTitles.ko: 누가 우리 오빠들 좀 말려 주세요

description.en:
I only went to calm the disturbance in front of my house, but the one I encountered was the Demon King that I punished, and unfortunately, I was falsely accused of being the demon king and died in the hand of the subjugation team.

‘I’ll kick your ass, Pamel Asinov! I’ll make you shed tears from both of your eyes!’

Among them, the worst one was the hero, Pamel Asinov, who drove me to death as a Demon King!

But when I pleaded to take revenge, I opened my eyes, 500 years later! Pamel’s been dead for a long time, and the ‘brothers’ who came one day…

“Purple eyes. It’s not a color that anyone can have.”
“But I was like this from the beginning.”
“Yes, you were. Because you are the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov.”
“…the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov?”

Of all people, I’m the daughter of ‘that’ Asinov? It’s nice to live a peaceful life, but I was born an enemy’s blood!

‘All the brothers in this house have a habit of hugging people.’

This shitty family. I have to hate them, but why do I keep getting attached to them?

altTitles.ja: 遊☆戯☆王 OCG STORIES

description.en: In the distant past, the prosperous nation of Karma waged war against the nation of Spectra, resulting in the creation of an AI that wiped out all humans. Centuries later, Raye, the last surviving human, lives amongst an android society on the outskirts of Karma. On the night of her 13th birthday, her peaceful life is upended when Spectra attacks, destroying her home and forcing her friends to the front lines. Desperate to save everything she loves, Raye calls upon humanity's last bastion: "Sky Striker", the Karma-developed secret technology made to turn humans into the ultimate living weapons.… Unexpected, right? In this newest adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh, the focus of the plot is not on the card game, but instead the many storylines featured in the cards. The first arc surrounds the Sky Striker series, with more to come in the future.
description.ja: 世界で唯一生存する人間・レイはAIたちと平和に暮らしていた。しかしある日、敵国の攻撃が街を襲う。AIたちを守るため、レイは「閃刀姫」へと覚醒する―…!!
description.pt-br:
No passado distante, a próspera nação de Kama travou uma guerra contra a nação de Spectra, resultando na criação de uma IA que eliminou todos os humanos. Séculos depois, Raye, a última humana sobrevivente, vive entre uma sociedade de andróides nos arredores de Kama. Na noite de seu aniversário de 13 anos, sua vida pacífica é interrompida quando Spectra ataca, destruindo sua casa e forçando seus amigos a irem para a linha de frente. Desesperada para salvar tudo o que ama, Raye invoca o último bastião da humanidade: "Força Celeste", a tecnologia secreta desenvolvida por Kama feita para transformar humanos em armas vivas definitivas.

... Inesperado, certo? Nesta mais nova adaptação de Yu-Gi-Oh, o foco do enredo não está no jogo de cartas, mas sim nas muitas histórias apresentadas nas cartas. O primeiro arco envolve a série Força Celeste, com mais por vir no futuro.

title.en: I Want to Live a Good Life

description.en: The best in the world, excellent martial arts, overflowing money and pleasure----the center of the magical world, Black Astronomy. Kang Hee-ran, the granddaughter of the owner of Heukcheonmun, lives a life that has nothing to lack and nothing to be envied of, but dies at the hands of her stepmother. And for some reason, Heeran reverted to her younger self! In the life that started again, she goes down quietly and kindly with her warm nanny. The first step of revenge begins with making the third Confucius, Kang Lun, the king of the underworld who will soon rule Black Astronomy, into a man of Heiran...!!  I was trying to live...  Heeran's stepmother didn't like the way he looked and started to kill all of Heeran's people.  And Heeran went to the bottom of the Dark Astronomical Gate to the realm of the deep hell for revenge.

title.en: Demon X Angel, Can't Get Along!

altTitles.zh: 恶魔X天使 不能友好相处

altTitles.en: Demon X Angel Can't Get Along!

altTitles.ar: ملاك و شيطان! لا يمكن ان نتعايش

altTitles.pt-br: Demônio X Anjo, Não Conseguem Se Dar Bem!

altTitles.vi: Oan gia chung nhà: Thiên thần x Ác quỷ, sao mà thân được!?

description.ar: الشياطين والملائكة نوعان من الأجناس المتقابلة مع مرور الزمن سئموا من القتال ضد بعضهم بعض ولكي يتعايشوا بسلام سويا قرروا البدء بخطة زواج! الخطة لها فترة مراقبة مدتها عام واحد. إذا كان الشيطان والملاك لا يزالان غير قادرين على العيش سويا وفهم بعضهم البعض بشكل جيد ، فسيتم إلغاء الزواج و نتيجة لذلك ، تم اختيار جيا تشينغ (الشيطان) و يو شانشان (الملاك) بواسطة اليانصيب كشريكين في الزواج ، وبدأت حياتهم سويا كزوجين يجب عليهم التعايش معا بشكل جيد.
description.en: Demons and angels are natural enemies that have grown tired of fighting each other. In order to coexist peacefully, they decided to arrange a marriage between the two races! If the pair can't get along within the one-year trial period, the marriage will be dissolved. This is how Jiacheng (Demon) and Yu Shanshan (Angel) became the chosen "lucky" pair for the marriage. Sharing the goal of divorce, the two began their lives of "happy" cohabitation!
description.pt-br: Demônios e anjos são duas raças opostas. À medida que os tempos mudam, eles estão cansados ​​de lutar. Para conviverem pacificamente, decidiram iniciar um plano de casamento! O plano tem um período de observação de um ano. Se os demônios e os anjos ainda não se derem bem, o casamento será cancelado. Como resultado, Jiacheng (demônio) e Yu Shanshan (anjo) foram “felizmente” selecionados por sorteio como parceiros de casamento, e começaram uma vida de coabitação “feliz” com o destino do divórcio.

title.en: The Male Lead Is Trying to Change the Female Lead

altTitles.en: The Hero Is Trying to Change the Heroine

altTitles.fr: Le principal masculin essaie de changer la principale féminin
Le héros essaie de changer la heroïne

altTitles.es: ¿El protagonista masculino está tratando de cambiar a la protagonista femenina?

altTitles.ja: 脇役のはずが、主人公に求婚されています

description.en:
I ended up possessing the body of an extra named Luberia, who is barely mentioned in the story. And right in the tragic novel *Emperor Caesar*, full of wars and disasters, where the protagonist sacrifices everything for the love of the hero and everyone ends up dying! I planned to live discreetly and hide my strength... 

But the male lead, Caesar, keeps looking for me and even proposes marriage, saying he wants to keep me around. Luberia doesn't want to meet the same tragic end as the protagonist, so she tries to avoid Caesar at all costs... But due to Caesar's intimidating appearance and assertiveness, before she knows it, she ends up engaged to him. 

Will Luberia manage not to fall in love with Caesar and survive until the end?
description.es: Quedé poseída por la extra 'Ruberia' cuyo nombre apenas se mencionaba. ¡Por qué, en la empobrecida novela <César se convierte en Emperador>, que está llena de guerras y accidentes, y donde la protagonista femenina se sacrifica por el protagonista masculino y todos mueren! Había planeado ocultar mis fuerzas y vivir en silencio y en silencio... El protagonista masculino, "César", sigue visitando a Ruberia e incluso le pide que se case con él, diciendo que quiere mantenerla a su lado.

title.en: Yume no Shizuku, Kin no Torikago

altTitles.ja: 夢の雫、黄金の鳥籠

altTitles.en: Drops of Dreams, the Golden Birdcage

altTitles.vi: Tàn dư mộng ước, Lồng chim hoàng kim

description.en:
Beginning of 16th century – Alexandra was captured by slave traders from Ukraine during one of their many raids. 
When the traders arrived in Greece to sell the female slaves, a young handsome man named Mateus bought her 
and promised to give her true freedom. 
He hired countless teachers, scholars, and palace ladies to train her into the most perfect woman of her time. 
Mateus's kindness has caused Alexandra to deeply fall in love with him, and she secretly wishes to be his concubine. 
But Mateus has already promised her to his best friend… Suleiman the Great, Emperor of the Ottoman Empire! 
What does freedom mean when you are in another man’s harem and can only look at the one you love from afar? 
Not willing to endure agony, Alexandra promises herself that one day she will free both of them from their bird cages… 
but Mateus is the Grand Vizier, power only second to the Emperor himself. 
So Alexandra must become the most influential concubine in order to have any hope which also means, bearing Suleiman’s son. 
However, Suleiman already has a son by another concubine, and this woman is determined to keep her son as the only prince.  
  
Hence begins the story of a slave to an empress of the greatest empire of all time – 
Alexandra, the woman who would one day be known as Roxelana, Empress of the Ottoman Empire.
description.vi: Tác phẩm “Yume no Shizuku, Kin no Torikago" kể về câu chuyện của Alexandra, một cô gái trẻ sống tại Ruthenia bị bắt cóc bởi quân Tatar và được bán làm nô lệ cho Đế quốc Ottoman. Alexandra sau đó được đưa vào hậu cung của Sultan Suleiman I và đổi tên thành Hurrem. Hurrem trở thành một trong những phi tần được sủng ái nhất của Sultan Suleiman I và sau đó trở thành Haseki Sultan, một trong những nhân vật quyền lực nhất trong hậu cung.

altTitles.ja: 伝説の男の娘もっこり配信者

description.en:
A femboy shows off his bulge on a livestream!!

However, it gets even more popular than he expected?!

---

* Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mukunozaltusou/status/1844651030761685297)
description.id: Seorang cowok cantik mencoba mengolok-olok penonton om-om dengan Steaming sambil cross-dressing dan memamerkan tubuh montoknya!! Namun, tidak disangka dia mendapatkan popularitas karena hal lain...!?
description.ja:
配信でもっこりを見せつける男の娘‼

しかし、それが以外にも人気が出てしまい…⁉

altTitles.ja: だぶるぷれい

description.en: Having forgotten his keys, Tamao Hiroi a high-school student, returns home using the back entrance and is surprised to find a stranger in his bed… Soon he realizes this is no stranger but Ran Homura, one year younger, softball ace and one of the most beautiful girls at school! Hiroi watches her masturbating on his bed and instinctively does the same peeking through the glass door.
description.ja: 高校二年生・広井玉緒は元野球部員。蝉時雨の降り注ぐ、ある夏の日。帰宅すると、誰もいない筈の自室から吐息が漏れていた。ソフトボール部の4番でエース、学年イチの美少女である穂村蘭。少女はベッドの上で玉緒の名を囁きながら、その指は切なく蒼き衝動を求める。瞬間。汗と吐息が、夏に溶ける────。一つ屋根の下、少年は憧れの少女と暮らし始め、境界線は重なり、消えていく……。
description.vi:
Nam sinh trung học Hiroi Tamao, cựu thành viên của đội bóng chày vào một ngày hè nọ, cậu vô tình phát hiện có tiếng thở dốc phát ra từ phòng mình. Hóa ra đó chính là Homura Ran một cô nàng xinh đẹp và là át chủ bài số 4 của đội bóng mềm, cô đã đe dọa Hiroi và bắt cậu phải làm nô lệ cho riêng mình. Thêm vào đó bố mẹ của họ đã tái hôn với nhau nên thành ra cả hai người sẽ phải chung sống cùng nhau dưới một mái nhà. Câu chuyện tình kỳ lạ giữa cặp đôi chủ tớ chính thức bắt đầu.

Double Play will get two outs or get two loves

Vì sao tựa truyện lại là Double Play thì đọc lại dòng này trên bìa từng tập nhé: Double Play will get two outs or get two loves

Double Play là trường hợp cả hai người cùng bị loại, cái này hình như dùng cho cả bóng chày và bóng mềm và xét lại dàn nhân vật thì những ai chơi thể thao và có thể bị loại ra sân được nào:

+Tsurugi Nao (Quản lý đội bóng thì thi đấu gì)
+Usui Fuki (Không chơi thể thao)
+Homura Ran (Át chủ bài đội bóng mềm=>có thi đấu)
+Hiroi Tamao (Thành viên đội bóng chày=>có thi đấu)

Giờ thì hiểu Double Play will get two outs rồi
Tiếp đến là or get two loves thì xét tiếp chỉ có Ran và Tamao là tình song phương trong cả 4 người
=>Double Play ở đây là để ám chi Hiroi Tamao và Homura Ran

title.en: Tearmoon Teikoku Monogatari ~Dantoudai kara Hajimaru, Hime no Tensei Gyakuten Story~

altTitles.ja: ティアムーン帝国物語～断頭台から始まる、姫の転生逆転ストーリー～@COMIC

altTitles.en: Tearmoon Empire Story: The Reincarnation Reversal Story of the Princess, Starting from the Guillotine

altTitles.th: บันทึกเรื่องราวจักรวรรดิเทียร์มูน จุดพลิกผันชะตากรรมของเจ้าหญิงเริ่มจากบนกิโยติน

altTitles.zh: 迪阿姆帝国物语 ～从断头台开始的、公主的转生逆转传

altTitles.zh-hk: 堤亞穆帝國物語～從斷頭台開始，公主重生後的逆轉人生～

altTitles.en: Tearmoon Empire Story: Beginning from the Guillotine, a Story of a Reincarnated Princess Making a Turn Around

altTitles.vi: Biên niên sử về đế chế Tearmoon

description.en:
In the Tearmoon Empire, the disdained selfish princess Mia was sentenced to death – or at least, she was supposed to have been! Instead, she woke up as her twelve-year-old self??

To avoid the guillotine in her second life, she won't repeat her past failures… "F-For me, something of this level is an easy task!" 

Ultimate self-defense! Strongest self-awareness! Using her previously clumsy, timid princess image, she will go against fate- a once-in-a-lifetime fantasy of fixing history!
description.ja: 崩壊したティアムーン帝国で、わがまま姫と蔑まれた皇女ミーアは処刑された――はずが、目覚めた彼女は12歳の少女に逆戻り？？ 第二の人生でギロチンを回避するため、帝政の建て直しを決意する。手始めに忠義に厚い下っ端メイドと、左遷されかけた優秀な文官を味方につけ、失敗した過去をやり直す日々が始まった。けれど、ミーアの本音は「我が身の安全第一」。仇敵を遠ざけ、人脈作りに励むうちに、なぜか周囲の忖度で次々と奇跡が実現！やがて、身勝手なはずの行動は大陸全土の未来を大きく変えていくのだった……。保身上等！自己中最強！小心者の元(？)ポンコツ姫が前世の記憶を使って運命に抗う、一世一代の歴史改変ファンタジー！
description.es-la: En el Imperio Tearmoon, la despreciada princesa egoísta Mia fue sentenciada a muerte, ¡O al menos se suponía que debía serlo! ¿En cambio, ella se despertó como su yo de doce años? Para evitar la guillotina en su segunda vida, no repetirá sus fracasos pasados​​... "¡P-para mí, algo de este nivel es una tarea fácil!" ¡Última defensa personal! ¡Autoconciencia más fuerte! Usando su imagen de princesa tímida y previamente torpe, irá en contra del destino, ¡Una fantasía única en la vida de arreglar la historia!

altTitles.ja: ディアマイマスター～Dom/Sub universe～

description.en: In a world where the Dom and Sub secondary genders exist, Makimura Hayato, a Dom idol is struggling to succeed. But when he accidently discovers the top idol's, Himuro Ren's secret, he finds that new opportunities may be opening to him...

altTitles.ja: キン肉マン

description.en:
Kinnikuman (Muscleman), a weak and clumsy super hero, constantly getting into wacky situations. As the series progressed, the story began changing from comedy to action as Kinnikuman battles stronger and stronger foes in the wrestling ring. The series continually introduced new Super Human characters, known as Chojin, who would challenge Kinnikuman and his friends for various purposes.  
    
---
- **The initial serialization lasted from 1979-1986 and ended with Vol. 36. The series directly continued in 2011 with Vol. 37.**
- **The 2011 Chapters resets the Count to 1 during it set of volumes (Beyond Vol 36)**

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1985**
description.pt-br:
Kinnikuman (Homem Músculo), um super-herói fraco e desajeitado, constantemente entrando em situações malucas. À medida que a série avançava, a história começou a mudar de comédia para ação, enquanto Kinnikuman lutava contra inimigos cada vez mais fortes no ringue de luta livre. A série continuamente introduziu novos personagens Super Humanos, conhecidos como Chojin, que desafiariam Kinnikuman e seus amigos para vários propósitos. 

A serialização original foi de 1979-1986 e terminou com o Vol. 36. A série continuou diretamente em 2010. 

Ganhou o Shogakukan Manga Awards por melhor Shounen em 1985.

altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

altTitles.es-la: Völundio: Saga de las espadas divergentes

altTitles.vi: Volundio - Sử thi về mộng kiếm

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

altTitles.ja: 限界独身女子(26)ごはん

altTitles.vi: Bữa ăn đạm bạc của bà chị (26) độc thân

altTitles.es-la: Comidas de despedida de soltera de 26 años
El sufrimiento de una Doomer no amada de 26 años

altTitles.en: The Meals Of A Single Woman (26) At Her Limit
The Meals Of a 26 Year Old Single At Her Limit
The Suffering of a 26 Year Old Unloved Female Doomer

altTitles.pt-br: O Sofrimento de uma Doomer de 26 Anos Não Amada
Refeições de uma mulher solteira no limite (26 anos)

description.en: Hiiragi-san is a single woman who is exhausted from work and life. No matter how depressed she is, she always ends up hungry.
description.ja:
鬱、孤独、たまに飯。
仕事につかれ、生活につかれた限界独身女子の柊さん。どんなに憂鬱でも、おなかだけは空いてしまうようです。
description.vi: Cuộc sống hằng ngày cùng những bữa ăn đạm bạc của bà chị độc thân thất nghiệp chán đời.
description.es-la: La Sr. Hiiragi, es una chica marginalmente soltera que está cansada del trabajo y la vida. No importa cuán deprimido esté, mi estómago parece estar vacío.
description.pt-br: Hiiragi-san é uma mulher solteira, exausta do trabalho e da vida. Não importa o quão deprimida ela esteja, ela sempre acaba ficando com fome.

altTitles.en: A Tale of a Small Town hardship in Sengoku Era - An Agriculture Comic

altTitles.ja: 戦国小町苦労譚 農耕戯画

altTitles.zh: 战国小町苦劳谭-农耕戏画

altTitles.fr: Les difficultés d'un village à l'époque Sengoku - Une histoire agricole

description.en:
One fateful day, a girl time slipped into the Sengoku Era. It was an abrupt enough event to be dubbed god’s whim, done to sate hellish boredom. The girl has no power to change the world.  
She was a very ordinary, common, and plain girl that can be found anywhere.  And that girl can do no more than a single thing...

Survive the Sengoku Era – that’s all.  
  


---

Adapted from [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8406bm/) (Raw)  
Light Novel: [Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/62898/)  
Alternative Manga Raw: [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/3714)
description.fr: Shizuko est une lycéenne ordinaire avec des intérêts extraordinaires : l'Histoire et l'agricutlure. Ces passions vont peut-être lui sauver la vie : projetée à la période Sengoku, elle se retrouve au service d'un seigneur excentrique et exigeant : le fameux Oda Nobunaga. Obsédé par l'idée d'unifier le pays en proie aux guerres intestines, il entend bien faire usage des étranges compétences de cette fille venue d'ailleurs. Shizuko parviendra-t-elle à gagner sa confiance ? Retournera-t-elle à son époque ?

title.en: How to Survive as a Maid in a Horror Game

altTitles.en: Surviving as a Maid in a Horror Game

description.en:
"How did you know? I hid it well so that no one would find out."
 
Adrian Caesar von de Paltzgraf, the successor to the Paltzgraf Family. He is hailed as an angel in this world, but only I knew that the serial murders and murder attempts happening in the area which everyone was talking about were all committed by a young, good-looking gentleman.

[Adrian's murderous intent has increased.]
[Convince Adrian to lower his murderous intent. If not, you die.]
[Adrian's murderous intent is at 92%.]

I am the only one who knows. I was the only one who transmigrated into the world of this ridiculous horror game.

---

Note:
- Only Ridibooks has all the volumes, due to Volume 1 of the side stories being R19.
- "No Exit Horror" is the English name on the ebook and physical Korean novel cover.

title.en: Tensei Shitekara 40-nen. Sorosoro, Ojisan mo Koi ga Shitai. Nidome no Jinsei wa Harem Route?!

altTitles.ja: 転生してから４０年。そろそろ、おじさんも恋がしたい。　二度目の人生はハーレムルート!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Shite Kara 40-nen. Sorosoro, Ojisan mo Koi ga Shitai. Nidome no Jinsei wa Harem Route?!

altTitles.en: It's been 40 Years Since I was Reincarnated. It's Time for an Older Man Like Me to Fall in Love. My Second Life is a Harem Route?!
It's been 40 Years Since I was Reincarnated. It's Time for this Uncle to Fall in Love.

altTitles.ru: Прошло 40 лет с тех пор, как я перевоплотился. Пришло время этому дяде влюбиться.

description.en: Forty years have passed since his reincarnation, and the guild leader, Girold, has been working diligently. Looking back on his life, he realizes that he hasn't been able to get married, so he tries his best to get a girlfriend, but there is no luck. He thinks he's not popular, but the girls around him are trying to approach him… The harem love comedy from "Shosetsuka ni Narou" begins! (DeepL)
description.ja: 転生してから40年、ひたむきに仕事に励むギルド長・ジロルド。これまで人生を振り返り、結婚できていないことに気づいた彼は、恋人作りに励んでいるのだが収穫はなし。モテていないと思っているジロルドに対して、周りの女の子たちは彼にアプローチをしかけているが…。

altTitles.ja: 人間凶器カツオ!

description.en: The protagonist Hamada Katsuo, is your everyday pervert/loser character. He's starting a new semester in school, so he wants to escape from his loser days, the only problem is the new change in look/lifestyle he got is that of a gang member. He beats a strong guy that was bullying a friend of his by mistake and now, because of it he's the target for all the gangs in the region, even though he's still only a weakling and a pervert. Will Katsuo escape alive…? Find out.

Ji-hwan Kang, who was forced to transfer schools after getting involved in a gang fight, decides to ask Yu-seong Han, the top student in the class, for help with his studies. However, he accidentally tears Yu-seong's school uniform. But what's that on Yu-seong's back? A tiger tattoo on this supposedly model student?! Ji-hwan proposes to keep Yu-seong's tattoo and identity a secret in exchange for tutoring. In response, Yu-seong deliberately begins to engage in close physical contact, hoping to make Ji-hwan give up on his own...

title.en: Shiretto Sugee Koto Itteru Gal. - Shiritsu Paranomaru Koukou no Nichijou

altTitles.ja: しれっとすげぇこと言ってるギャル。ー私立パラの丸高校の日常ー

altTitles.ja-ro: Shiretto Sugee Koto Iteru Gal. - Shiritsu Paranormal Koukou no Nichijou

altTitles.en: The Gals Who Always Say Insane Things: My Daily Life at a Private Paranormal High School

description.en:
Youth = friendship, effort, and future prediction! A very ordinary and supernatural daily life led by the strongest and most invincible gyarus with different abilities.

Based on the short animations on Youtube. 
- [Official YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@parako)
- [Official Twitter/X](https://twitter.com/parako_official)
___
[Alt Official Raw (Young Jump)](https://ynjn.jp/title/11987)
description.ja: 青春＝友情、努力、未来予知!? 最強無敵の異能力ギャルが送る、ごくごく普通の超常的な日常。 累計再生数1.6億回！本作の元となったYoutubeチャンネル「私立パラの丸高校」では、みらい＆ へー子の最強異能力ギャルズの他、光やクラスメイト達の声優ボイス付き動画がたくさん見れるので、ぜひチェックしてみてください!!

title.en: Uragirareta Boukensha, Andeddo Toshite Yomigaeri Musou Suru

altTitles.ja: アンデッド・キング 〜底辺冒険者、魔物の力で進化無双〜

altTitles.en: Undead King ~A Low-Ranking Adventurer, With the Power of Monsters, Becomes Unbeatable~

altTitles.ja: 裏切られた冒険者、アンデッドとして蘇り無双する

description.en:
(skills). A power humans can only receive once from god, which is used to fight against monsters.
Chrome, who aspired to be an adventurer while owning a skill that is useless in combat, is unable to throw away his ambition, and is despised for his inability, so he is left in charge of menial tasks and chores for his career.
But, when he is running away from a monster as a decoy, he loses his life. But at that time, his skill activates. The skill (Revival). For one time only, he can come back from the dead, and Chrome miraculously revives as a Skeleton monster, a “Wight”.
Chrome, who despairs at his new body, finds out that as monsters evolve, their appearance changes in accordance, so he decides to evolve as fast as possible. Believing he can regain his human appearance, Chrome spends his days hunting monsters. As a by-product, Chrome gains a multitude of skills, whereas a human can only ever hold one––!
Powerful monster abilities and the intelligence of a human. Overcoming adversity with chance, Chrome once again aims to be the strongest adventurer!

title.en: I Became a Top Actor Just by Reading Books!

altTitles.vi: Trở thành diễn viên hàng đầu nhờ vào việc đọc sách

description.en:
Due to his lack of talent, Seonghyeon gave up acting and became a writer. Seonghyeon is a genius author with a natural talent for screenplays, but he still misses acting. Then one day, he got into a truck accident on set.

“If I’m born again, I have to act,” he promised and closed his eyes.

Seonghyeon returns 13 years back into the past to when he was 24 years old. And the method acting ability that goes into his scripts became the character itself! Okay, this life is about being reborn as a genius actor!
The extraordinary Princess Parfait's marvelous fantasy adventure!

altTitles.ja: 期間限定のお姫様

description.en:
An ordinary employee Yun Jae-eun became Princess Diamantine from inside a novel!   
  
B.u.t.  
  
"Why of all things, even if I transmigrate, did I have to end up as someone who'll soon get a death penalty, Sheillia, the villainess out of villainesses…!"  
  
Jae-eun, who has a hunch about her own unfortunate fate, decides to try to change Sheillia's set fate.  
  
The dying princess, despite opening her eyes, Delphinium Palace where no one rejoiced was gradually changing that way but…

altTitles.ja: Masters of Takeshi

title.en: Kaisha to Shiseikatsu: On to Off

altTitles.ja: 会社と私生活　－オンとオフ－

altTitles.en: Company and Private Life: On and Off

altTitles.es-la: Vida empresarial y privada: ON y OFF

description.en:
Working people have company (on) and private lives (off). 

Meet two office workers whose professional lives "on" the clock and private lives when they’re "off" couldn't be more different. He dresses like a lolita. She dresses like a punk. 

When their contrasting "on" and "off" modes collide, it inevitably leads to heart-pounding antics!

---

A serialization of the [Twitter series](https://mangadex.org/title/0fa5d834-fdab-4ac4-b3c9-821f1580f991/company-and-private-life) about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.
description.ja:
働く二人の大変身（メタモルフォーゼ）日常譚！
働く人々には会社（オン）と私生活（オフ）がある。ある人は会社員と女装ロリィタ。ある人は会社員と男装パンク。オンとオフのギャップにキュン必至！ 働く二人の大変身（メタモルフォーゼ）日常譚！X（旧:Twitter）にて累計200万いいね突破の話題作が、イラストから完全コマ割りでコミックス化！
description.es-la: Estos trabajadores tienen una vida en la empresa (ON) y otra privada (OFF). El es un oficinista que se viste de Lolita. Ella es una oficinistas que se viste de punk.

title.en: Maou to Ryuuou ni Sodaterareta Shounen wa Gakuen Seikatsu wo Musou suru You desu

altTitles.ja: 魔王と竜王に育てられた少年は学園生活を無双するようです

altTitles.en: The Boy Raised by the Demon Queen and the Dragon Queen Has No Rival

description.en: A boy named Ruisha is trapped in a distorted space created by the ancient hero. What he finds there is the Demon King and the Dragon King, who should have been defeated by the hero 300 years ago. Ruisha befriends the Demon King and the Dragon King, and is trained by them, going from a weak child to a legendary warrior with the power of both demons and dragons. Using his power, Ruisha escaped from the strange place and was accepted into the magic academy where the hero’s descendants live. And now he will have to face many challenges to free the Demon King and Dragon King.
description.ja:
「魔王」と「竜王」の力を継ぐ少年の無双ファンタジー！
才能ゼロの少年ルイシャは、ある日謎の穴に落ちてしまう。その先にいたのは、巨乳で美人の「魔王」と褐色幼女の「竜王」！　2人から300年の修行を受け、少年は魔族と竜族の力に覚醒する！　ちょっとだけHな少年の英雄譚が、タテ読みフルカラーで開幕！

description.en:
Flora was born to become the main character, and 'I' will always stand behind her. Being sacrificed or beaten with wretched words didn’t matter if it made Flora shine every time. Because I thought that a role was just a role.
But Flora, I have to kill you and end this play now.

altTitles.en: コイバナ! 恋せよ花火

description.en: Due to some mishaps during her entrance exams, Hanabi Marui finds herself entering a school of mostly boys. This is a problem for our heroine, as she has a huge disgust for the male gender. But then she meets someone who slowly turns her world upside down. This series follows the trials she and her friends go through with love.
description.es: Debido a algunos contratiempos durante sus exámenes de ingreso, Hanabi Marui encuentra a sí misma entrando a una escuela de la mayoría varones. Esto es un problema para nuestra heroína, ya que tiene un enorme disgusto para el género masculino. Pero entonces conoce a alguien que gira lentamente su mundo al revés. Esta serie sigue los ensayos que ella y sus amigos van a través del amor.

altTitles.ja: SIGNAL

altTitles.vi: Bắt nạt mình đi mà, nữ phản diện ơi!

altTitles.th: โปรดรังแกฉันทีคุณนางร้าย!

altTitles.zh-ro: Qǐng qīfù wǒ ba, è yì xiǎojiě!

altTitles.ru: Пожалуйста, поиздевайтесь надо мной, мисс Злодейка!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor, me humilhe, senhorita vilã!

altTitles.ar: !تنمرِ علي من فضلكِ يا أنسة الشر

altTitles.fr: Je vous en supplie madame l'antagoniste, Harcelez moi !

altTitles.ja: いじめてください、悪役令嬢様！

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

title.en: Won't She Speak Well, That Girl Who Woke Up From a Dream?

altTitles.ja-ro: Yume kara Sameta Ano Ko to wa Kitto Umaku Shaberenai

altTitles.ja: 夢から覚めたあの子とはきっと上手く喋れない
おそろち

description.en:
This story was first published in August 1969 issue of COM. It’s the fifth story in the Nagatani Kunio’s parody theater series, which was later compiled in Bakashiki-Nagatani Kunio’s Collection of Plagiarized Works (バカ式: 長谷邦夫盗作全集, Akebono, 1970).  
The title, “Osorochi” (おそろち), is a play on the words “orochi” (おろち), another work by Umezu, and “osoroshii” (恐ろしい), which means “dreadful, scary.” The pun is kept throughout the story every time the word “dreadful” is used. 
Umezu Kazuo’s name is also written with different kanji. While his name is spelled “楳図かずお”, here, Nagatani & Fujio Pro use 梅図まずお (Umezu Mazuo) as their penname. The joke is that the kanji for “plum” (梅), which also reads as “ka” is used in his family name, and his given name was turned into “mazuo,” which is a pun on “mazui” (まずい), i.e. something that sucks.

altTitles.ja: ようかい居酒屋 のんべれケ

description.en:
Girls cry! Laugh! And get harassed! Young female college student, Hino Motogane, starts a part-time job at a small late night Izakaya. However the shop’s clientele – were youkai. These youkais do all kinds of things to their favorite Hino, sometimes they strip her, sometimes they cover her in spit, no matter what they work her to death! After all, she wants her paycheck…. Come on in under the curtain into an Izakaya comedy where girls are full of laughter, tears, sweat, spit, and who knows what fluids that are flying about.  
  


---
description.es:
¡Chicas llorando! ¡Risas! ¡Y acoso sexual! La joven estudiante universitaria, Hino Motogane, comienza un trabajo de medio tiempo en un pequeño Izakaya nocturno. Sin embargo, la clientela de la tienda eran los Youkai. ¡Estos youkai le hacen todo tipo de cosas a Hino, a veces la desnudan o a veces la cubren en saliva sin importar qué! A pesar de todo, ella sigue trabajando ya que solo quiere su cheque de pago… Esta es una comedia de Izakaya donde las chicas están llenas de risas, lágrimas, sudor, saliva y quién sabe qué clase de fluidos más.  
  


---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka's Twitter](https://twitter.com/nonco331)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Mangaka’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/1005887)

title.en: Zombie no Afureta Sekai Ore Dake ga Osowarenai

altTitles.en: Only I Am Not Attacked in a World Overflowing With Zombies

altTitles.ja: ゾンビのあふれた世界で俺だけが襲われない

altTitles.en: In A World Filled With Zombies, I’m The Only One They Won’t Attack

altTitles.pt-br: Em um Mundo Cheio de Zumbis, Eu Sou o Único que Eles Não Vão Atacar

altTitles.id: Didunia yang penuh dengan Zombie hanya aku yang tidak diserang

altTitles.zh-hk: 在遍地都是喪屍的世界裡唯獨我不被襲擊

altTitles.vi: Chỉ có tôi là người không bị tấn công trong một thế giới tràn ngập thây ma

description.en: Takemura wakes up after falling ill for 3 days and realizes the world has been overrun by zombies but for some strange reason he is not being attacked by them! What will he do now with this great power he has?
description.id: Kehidupan sehari-hari pekerja kantor yang tidak disukai "Takemura" berubah dalam sekejap. Ketika aku perhatikan, itu adalah dunia yang penuh dengan zombie. Terlebih lagi, aku satu-satunya yang tidak diserang oleh zombie. "Bantu orang? Apa itu? Aku akan menjalani dunia ini sesukaku." Takemura memiliki banyak kekuatan di dunia apokaliptik di mana peradaban akan runtuh. Apakah dia satu-satunya pahlawan yang hidup dengan menyembunyikan fakta bahwa dia tidak diserang?
description.pt-br: Na sociedade atual, que foi completamente destruída por zumbis, há um homem que misteriosamente não é atacado por eles, e essa história segue sua estilo de vida egoísta. 18 Visualizações totais, 18 Visualizações hoje
